snippet: A lawyer defending one of the six young men accused in a gang rape case that has gripped India claimed that his client had been tortured by the police and that his confession had been coerced.
abstract: Lawyer defending one of six young men accused in gang rape case that has gripped India says his client was tortured by police and his confession was coerced.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer defending one of the six young men accused in a gang rape case that has gripped India claimed that his client had been tortured by the police and that his confession had been coerced.

headline.seo: Lawyer Says Indian Gang Rape Suspect Was Tortured by Police
headline.main: Lawyer Says Indian Gang Rape Suspect Was Tortured by Police
headline.print_headline: India: Torture of Rape Suspect Claimed
